MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven affecting properties in Drumaird Farm and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs to damaged electrical equipment, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.44am on Monday 29th March 2021.
